search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Teachery (teachery.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The exact URL for Teachery's official pricing page is: [https://www.teachery.co/pricing](https://www.teachery.co/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
Teachery Pricing: One Simple Plan with 14-Day Free Trial
===============

![Image 1](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WYXuHQHFOjI6xcFLlVsMhtmsIM.png)

Limited time offer: Pay ONCE for Teachery

We're ditching the monthly payments for a limited time only.

[Grab this deal now](https://www.teachery.co/limited-time?v=1)

![Image 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xrsBIrl1uUigI5BMLxPhSHmqqtc.gif)

[](https://www.teachery.co/)

Start for Free

[Features](https://www.teachery.co/features)

[Pricing](https://www.teachery.co/pricing)

[Sign In](https://www.teachery.co/login)

![Image 3](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5RHmQASsGMrXcZRZIWFufDDys.png?scale-down-to=512)

One simple plan,  
no transaction fees
======================================

### For a limited time, when you join us you'll lock in your pricing forever. That means if we raise our price in the future, your price NEVER goes up!

Limited time offer: Lock in this price forever!

Monthly

Yearly - Save $100+

$49

/month

14-day free trial included

[Grab this deal now](https://www.teachery.co/signup)

Everything included:

Unlimited courses

Unlimited students

Unlimited landing pages

Custom domains

Customer analytics

Lesson drip scheduling

[View all features](https://www.teachery.co/features)

How Teachery compares

Let's see how Teachery's monthly plan compares with a few other course platforms

Real human support
------------------

![Image 32](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GZ7vz1y2dzUsIBA8UCymjLJ5FI.png)

Shenetta Webster

⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️

"**The best thing about Teachery is that it's both simple and powerful.**

The design is intuitive making it easy to get started without intimidation or overwhelm.

Teachery packs every feature you could possibly need to create and sell courses that look professional and appealing."

![Image 33](https://framerusercontent.com/images/M8U8xKwo75D7JdM88fYZXLo.png)

Yana Dirkx

⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️

"As someone who implements Teachery for others, I love how you can create a completely different look-and-feel for each client, even when they are operating in the same market.

**My clients get something that matches their brand from start to finish, and I have a breeze settings things up.** It’s awesome!"

![Image 34](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bv5mSAQonniwNs1rThuIUKeqxWg.png)

Bridget Baker

⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️

"As a brand + website designer, I was looking for a way to deliver content to my clients, but **none of the other course platforms were doing it for me**.

Teachery is easy to use, fun to design in, has a helpful knowledge base and support chat, and has everything you need to create courses, upsells, and welcome emails.

And, most importantly, Teachery is a company that shares my values for social justice and anti-racism. 🏳️🌈"

![Image 35](https://framerusercontent.com/images/A7VReVGdNeEKq1mkLmY8ht8RqM.png)

Angel Sullivan

⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️⭐️️

"I’d have to say my favorite thing about Teachery is **how customizable it is, WITHOUT having a huge learning curve.**

Teachery really let me dive in and start creating something beautiful and useful for my customers, quickly!"

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Teachery offers a single subscription plan with unlimited features and a limited-time one-time payment option.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: One simple plan with unlimited features.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Pay once for Teachery and lock in your pricing forever.
